metadata.title: CVE-2017-2896 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
An exploitable out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the xls_mergedCells function of libxls 1.4. . A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruption resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS file to trigger this vulnerability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

r-cran-readxl - 1.0.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-2').
